Set.Text: +15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Land Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_IRON] Iron [ICON_TIN] Tin [ICON_MANGANESE] Manganese worked by this City produces +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have a mined source of Iron nearby.

Each source of [ICON_RES_WHEAT][ICON_RES_BANANA][ICON_RES_DEER][ICON_BARLEY][ICON_CORN] worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_FOOD] Food to be moved from this city along trade routes inside your civilization.

Land trade routes originating from this city have a 50% increase in range and produce an additional 2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold when connecting to another civilization.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_TEA][ICON_COFFEE][ICON_CACAO][ICON_TOBACCO] worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE Each source of [ICON_MANGO] Mango worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
Requires 1 [ICON_RES_COAL] Coal.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_TITANIUM] worked by this City + 2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.

Row.Text: Each source of [ICON_FLAX] Flax worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Each source of [ICON_ALOEVERA] worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and [ICON_WILDBERRIES] produce +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food.
